                                          interface LabelledValue {
  label: string;
}

function printLabel(labelledObj: LabelledValue) {
  console.log(labelledObj.label);
}

let myObj = { size: 10, label: "Size 10 Object" };
printLabel(myObj);

                                          åœ¨è¿™ä¸ªä¾‹å­ä¸­ï¼ŒLabelledValueæ¥å£å°±åƒä¸€ä¸ªåç‰‡ï¼Œå‘Šè¯‰å…¶ä»–ä»£ç ï¼Œåªè¦ä¸€ä¸ªå¯¹è±¡æœ‰labelå±æ€§ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”ç±»å‹ä¸ºstringï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå°±å¯ä»¥è®¤ä¸ºå®ƒæ˜¯LabelledValueã€‚

                                          æ¥å£ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥æè¿°å‡½æ•°ç±»å‹ï¼š

                                          interface SearchFunc {
  (source: string, subString: string): boolean;
}

let mySearch: SearchFunc;
mySearch = function(src: string, sub: string): boolean {
  let result = src.search(sub);
  return result > -1;
}

                                          æ­¤å¤–ï¼Œæ¥å£è¿˜èƒ½ç”¨äºæè¿°æ•°ç»„å’Œç´¢å¼•ç±»å‹ï¼š

                                          interface StringArray {
  [index: number]: string;
}

let myArray: StringArray;
myArray = ["Bob", "Fred"];

interface Dictionary {
  [index: string]: string;
}

let myDict: Dictionary;
myDict = { "key": "value" };

                                          ä¸ä¼ ç»Ÿçš„ JavaScript ä¸€æ ·ï¼ŒTypeScript ä¹Ÿä½¿ç”¨ç±»ï¼ˆClassesï¼‰æ¥å®šä¹‰å¯¹è±¡çš„è¡Œä¸ºã€‚ç„¶è€Œï¼ŒTypeScript çš„ç±»å…·æœ‰ä¸€äº›é¢å¤–çš„ç‰¹æ€§ï¼Œå¦‚è®¿é—®ä¿®é¥°ç¬¦ï¼ˆAccess Modifiersï¼‰ã€é™æ€å±æ€§ï¼ˆStatic Propertiesï¼‰ã€æŠ½è±¡ç±»ï¼ˆAbstract Classesï¼‰ç­‰ã€‚

                                          class Greeter {
  greeting: string;
  constructor(message: string) {
    this.greeting = message;
  }
  greet() {
    return "Hello, " + this.greeting;
  }
}

let greeter = new Greeter("world");

                                          TypeScript è¿˜å¼•å…¥äº†è®¿é—®ä¿®é¥°ç¬¦ publicã€private å’Œ protectedã€‚å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰æŒ‡å®šè®¿é—®ä¿®é¥°ç¬¦ï¼Œåˆ™é»˜è®¤ä¸º publicã€‚

                                          class Animal {
  private name: string;
  constructor(theName: string) { this.name = theName; }
}

                                          TypeScript ç±»è¿˜æ”¯æŒç»§æ‰¿ï¼Œé€šè¿‡extendså…³é”®å­—å¯ä»¥åˆ›å»ºä¸€ä¸ªå­ç±»ã€‚å­ç±»å¯ä»¥è®¿é—®å’Œæ”¹å˜çˆ¶ç±»çš„å±æ€§å’Œæ–¹æ³•ï¼š

                                          class Animal {
  name: string;
  constructor(theName: string) { this.name = theName; }
  move(distanceInMeters: number = 0) {
    console.log(`${this.name} moved ${distanceInMeters}m.`);
  }
}

class Dog extends Animal {
  constructor(name: string) { super(name); }
  bark() {
    console.log('Wo

of! Woof!');
  }
}

const dog = new Dog('Tom');
dog.bark();
dog.move(10);
dog.bark();

                                          ä¸ºäº†å®ç°å¤šæ€ï¼ŒTypeScript æä¾›äº†æŠ½è±¡ç±»çš„æ¦‚å¿µã€‚æŠ½è±¡ç±»æ˜¯ä¸èƒ½è¢«å®ä¾‹åŒ–çš„ç±»ï¼Œåªèƒ½ä½œä¸ºå…¶ä»–ç±»çš„åŸºç±»ã€‚æŠ½è±¡ç±»ä¸­å¯ä»¥å®šä¹‰æŠ½è±¡æ–¹æ³•ï¼ŒæŠ½è±¡æ–¹æ³•å¿…é¡»åœ¨æ´¾ç”Ÿç±»ä¸­å®ç°ï¼š

                                          abstract class Animal {
  abstract makeSound(): void;
  move(): void {
    console.log('roaming the earth...');
  }
}

class Dog extends Animal {
  makeSound() {
    console.log('Woof! Woof!');
  }
}

const myDog = new Dog();
myDog.makeSound();
myDog.move();
